meanings.definition: The lower part or underside of a vehicle.
meanings.sent1: The mechanic inspected the underbodies of the cars for any damage.
meanings.sent2: The car wash crew made sure to clean the underbodies of all the vehicles.
meanings.sent3: The underbodies of the cars were so shiny after the wash, they looked brand new!
meanings.sent4: The underbodies of the trucks were like hidden treasures waiting to be discovered.
meanings.sent5: The underbodies of the buses were so dirty, they resembled muddy caves.

meanings.definition: The lower part of a structure or object.
meanings.sent1: The architect designed the building with strong underbodies to support its weight.
meanings.sent2: The boat's underbodies were reinforced to withstand rough waves.
meanings.sent3: The underbodies of the tower were painted in bright colors, making it look playful.
meanings.sent4: The underbodies of the bridge connected the two sides like a sturdy foundation.
meanings.sent5: The underbodies of the treehouse were like a secret hideout for the kids.
